name: EXELON CORP
footnote: Exelons consolidated assets include $9,056 million and $9,532 million at March 31, 2020 and December 31, 2019, respectively, of certain VIEs that can only be used to settle the liabilities of the VIE. Exelons consolidated liabilities include $3,412 million and $3,473 million at March 31, 2020 and December 31, 2019, respectively, of certain VIEs for which the VIE creditors do not have recourse to Exelon. See Note 16  Variable Interest Entities for additional information.
